s === null) vErrors = [err]; else vErrors.push(err); errors++; ';
        }
        out += ' } else { ';
      }
    } else {
      if ($loopRequired) {
        if (!$isData) {
          out += ' var ' + ($vSchema) + ' = validate.schema' + ($schemaPath) + '; ';
        }
        var $i = 'i' + $lvl,
          $propertyPath = 'schema' + $lvl + '[' + $i + ']',
          $missingProperty = '\' + ' + $propertyPath + ' + \'';
